message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering the product! $20,000 is a bit out of my price range. Would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the value I place on the product, I understand your budget constraints. Could you do $17,000?
Thanks for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate you trying to meet me somewhere.  To be honest, $17,000 is still a bit of a stretch for me.  Would you be open to $10,000?
